Outdoor Plant Care Guide

Ensure your garden thrives with these expert outdoor gardening tips from our specialists.

Watering

Water deeply and less frequently to encourage strong root growth. Morning watering is best to prevent fungal issues and water evaporation.

Sunlight

Match plants to the appropriate sun exposure. Most outdoor plants need at least 6 hours of direct sunlight, while shade plants prefer less.

Mulching

Apply 2-3 inches of mulch around plants to conserve moisture, suppress weeds and regulate soil temperature. Keep mulch away from plant stems.

Pruning

Regular pruning encourages healthy growth and blooming. Remove dead or damaged branches and deadhead flowers to extend the blooming period.
